content: this textured fringed scarf uses a simple stitch combination worked along the length you ll have no ends to weave in at all it s a perfect project for mini skeins and is one of four patterns made from a single brava mini pack with 24 mini skeins of yarn this pattern was designed for the 2020 scarf & hat of the month club with the stitchin mommy 1 and oombawka design crochet 2 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog on here 3 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet double_crochet crocheting crocheting flat in row crocheting over yarn tails changing colors making fringe pattern includes links to photo or video tutorials for each **skill level** easy **finished size** teen/adult 66 5 169 cm length x 5 13 cm height not including fringe **materials** wecrochet brava yarn mini packs 100% acrylic 18 oz/600 g/1308 yd/1196 m in 28460 blues 1 mini skein each in 28413 black a 28435 hunter b 28418 celestial c 28442 peacock d 28450 silver e 28412 avocado f 28454 tranquil g 28443 peapod h 28451 sky i 28438 mint j and 28428 dove heather k *or approximately 32 yd 29 5 m each in a b c d e f g h i j and k in any medium weight yarn* wecrochet brava worsted yarn 100% acrylic 3 5 oz/100 g/218 yd/200 m 1 skein in 28419 clarity *or approximately 195 yd 178 5 m in l in any medium weight yarn * us size i-9/5 5 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge * yarn needle optional rotary cutter acrylic ruler and self-healing mat i used the 45 mm rotary cutter and mat from the cricut rotary cutting kit with the 3 acrylic ruler gauge 14 sts = 4 10 cm wide in pattern *exact gauge is not critical for this pattern * 1 https //www thestitchinmommy com/2020/01/announcing-the-2020-scarf-hat-of-the-month-club html 2 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2020/01/announcing-the-2020-scarf-and-hat-of-the-month-club-cal html 3 https //undergroundcrafter com/2020/12/20/fringe-scarf-crochet-pattern-ocean-fade/
